!.Intro Content
Dine With Us
Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or just spending a night on the town, Toro Toro is an exceptional setting for an evening to remember. Reach out with any questions about the restaurant, and we'll be happy to get in touch with you!

!.Intro Content Events the Miami Way Take a longer lunch break. Make the most of your day off. With fabulous events and culinary experiences, Toro Toro is more than Miami’s top restaurant destination. Pass by whenever you’d like; it's always a moment all week long... !.Events Content Toro Toro Presents Johnnie Walker Pairing Dinner October 3 07:00 pm TO 09:00 pm Join us for an unforgettable evening of bold flavors and rare spirits. Toro Toro Miami invites you to a private 4-course dinner expertly curated 4-course menu by Executive Chef Victor Rosales and paired with exclusive Johnnie Walker labels. Buy Tickets View Menu Miami Spice Months August 1 - September 30 12:00 am TO 12:00 am Dive into Miami Spice best dinner offering with a 3-course meal available 7 nights per week. $60++ includes a starter, main and dessert with a curated pan-Latin menu and delicious options. View Menu Here Thanksgiving Day November 27 12:00 am TO 12:00 am Thanksgiving Day Nov 27 Noon - Close Festive 3-course seasonal prix-fixe menu from just $85pp. See Menu Tacos y Chelas old version

Every saturday - 12:00 pm to 03:00 pm

end Every saturday Each Saturday from Noon - 3 PM, experience our newest dining journey which includes a Pan-Latin taco flight of (3) and draft beers $35++. Come savor the flavors that define our city's vibrant culinary scene! View Menu Here Toro Toro Live! old version

Every tuesday - 06:00 pm to 07:00 pm

end Every tuesday Each Tuesday catch our culinary team deliver interactive cooking demos from our award-winning menu of Toro Toro. NEW! Express Lunch $25 Weekdays Noon - 3 PM Choose two courses for a seasonal, express lunch at Toro Toro. See the menu to create your own meal and enjoy it for just $25++. Plus, indulge in our Taco Tuesday buffet for $39++ !.Close Content Stay in touch with toro toro Events the Miami Way Take a longer lunch break. Make the most of your day off.
